overview:
Patricia Calfee is the co-founder and CEO of Roses & Rye, a footwear business dedicated to supporting and celebrating Moms. Roses & Rye is Patriciaâ€™s second business in two years.

In early 2010, she co-founded Bergine, a luxury flash-sale deals site operating in San Francisco, Napa Valley and Los Angeles. Seven months after launch, Internet retail pioneer Gilt Groupe acquired Bergine.

Prior to Bergine, she created CalfeeSchoolGuide.org, an Internet and classroom resource for K12 students and families. Co-funded by angel investor Ron Conway, Patricia and her Board of Directors donated the non-profit program to the San Francisco Unified School District in 2009. Patricia was honored with an AT&T Community Hero Award and an AIGA cause/affect award for education.

Patricia began her career as the first employee and then Partner at a boutique public relations agency in San Francisco where she managed communications programs for Starwood Hotels & Resorts, Ian Shrager Company and Razorfish. She received a B.A. in Economics from the University of San Francisco.

Passionate about the benefits of mentorship for women and girls, Patricia has served as a director for a number of non-profit organizations.
